RecDescription: Ensure Administrative accounts are separate and cloud-only
CISDescription: Restrict Administrator Privileges to Dedicated Administrator Accounts

RecDescription: Ensure that between two and four global admins are designated
CISDescription: Establish and Maintain an Inventory of Accounts

RecDescription: Ensure that only organizationally managed/approved public groups exist
Ensure sign-in to shared mailboxes is blocked
Ensure the 'Password expiration policy' is set to 'Set passwords to never expire'
Ensure 'External sharing' of calendars is not available
CISDescription: Uninstall or Disable Unnecessary Services on Enterprise Assets and Software

RecDescription: Ensure the customer lockbox feature is enabled
Ensure Safe Links for Office Applications is Enabled
Ensure the Common Attachment Types Filter is enabled
Ensure notifications for internal users sending malware is Enabled
Ensure Safe Attachments policy is enabled
CISDescription: Deploy and Maintain Email Server Anti-Malware Protections

RecDescription: Ensure Safe Attachments for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Microsoft Teams is Enabled
CISDescription: Deploy and Maintain Email Server Anti-Malware Protections, Deploy and Maintain Anti-Malware Software

RecDescription: Ensure Exchange Online Spam Policies are set to notify administrators
Ensure that an anti-phishing policy has been created
CISDescription: Deploy and Maintain Email Server Anti-Malware Protections

RecDescription: Ensure that DKIM is enabled for all Exchange Online Domains
Ensure Microsoft 365 audit log search is Enabled
Ensure 'Restrict non-admin users from creating tenants' is set to 'Yes'
Ensure password hash sync is enabled for hybrid deployments
Ensure 'AuditDisabled' organizationally is set to 'False'
Ensure mailbox auditing for Office E3 users is Enabled
Ensure mailbox auditing for Office E5 users is Enabled
Ensure all forms of mail forwarding are blocked and/or disabled
Ensure mail transport rules do not whitelist specific domains
Ensure email from external senders is identified
Ensure users installing Outlook add-ins is not allowed
CISDescription: Restrict Unnecessary or Unauthorized Browser and Email Client Extensions

RecDescription: Ensure modern authentication for Exchange Online is enabled (Automated)
Ensure MailTips are enabled for end users
Ensure additional storage providers are restricted in Outlook on the web
Modern Authentication for SharePoint Applications
Ensure reauthentication with verification code is restricted
Ensure SharePoint and OneDrive integration with Azure AD B2B is enabled
Ensure external content sharing is restricted
Ensure OneDrive content sharing is restricted
Ensure that SharePoint guest users cannot share items they don't own
Ensure SharePoint external sharing is managed through domain whitelist/blacklists
Ensure link sharing is restricted in SharePoint and OneDrive
Ensure guest access to a site or OneDrive will expire automatically
Ensure Office 365 SharePoint infected files are disallowed for download
Ensure OneDrive sync is restricted for unmanaged devices
Ensure custom script execution is restricted on site collections
Ensure external file sharing in Teams is enabled for only approved cloud storage services
Ensure users can't send emails to a channel email address
Ensure 'external access' is restricted in the Teams admin center
Ensure anonymous users can't join a meeting
Ensure anonymous users and dial-in callers can't start a meeting
Ensure only people in my org can bypass the lobby
CISDescription: Define and Maintain Role-Based Access Control

RecDescription: Ensure users dialing in can't bypass the lobby
Ensure meeting chat does not allow anonymous users
Ensure only organizers and co-organizers can present
Ensure external participants can't give or request control
Ensure users can report security concerns in Teams
